ctx: intros Q a p Hz Hcl.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros Q a p Hz Hcl.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables a, p, q.

ctx: intros Q a p Hz Hcl.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros Q a p Hz Hcl.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, a0 : Term A n p : list (Term A n) Hz : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a a1 : Term A n p0, q, s : list (Term A n) H : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a1 H0 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q Q Hcl : CombLinear Q p0 H1 : eqP A eqA n s (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a1 q) p0) IHp : CombLinear Q p -> CombLinear Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p) Unable to unify "CombLinear Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p)" with "CombLinear Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a a0) (mults multA (n:=n) a p))".

original: intros Q a p Hz Hcl. induction p. - destruct Hz. - simpl. destruct Hcl. + apply CombLinear_1; auto. + apply IHp; auto.
